main.c

00001 //POB-Technology 2008
00002 // input output and timer example
00003 #include <dual-pob.h>
00004 
00005 // this example generate a clock pulse on pin 2 and pin 7 of PORTE
00006 // you can verify the clock pulse with an oscilloscope
00007 
00008 
00009 static UInt8 tick2;
00010 
00011 // Example of how to use timer function
00012 void MyTimerFunction(void)
00013 {
00014         // Clock output on pin 2 of PORTE: 
00015     if(tick2==0)
00016     {
00017                 SetOutput(PORTE,PIN_2);
00018         tick2=1;
00019         }
00020     else
00021     {
00022                 ClearOutput(PORTE,PIN_2);
00023         tick2=0;
00024         }
00025 
00026 }
00027 
00028 int main(void)
00029 {
00030         UInt8 tick;
00031         UInt8 portb;
00032         UInt8 porte;
00033         UInt8 portf;
00034         UInt8 portg;
00035 
00036         // Set io as default
00037         portb = IO_AS_DEFAULT ;
00038         portf = IO_AS_DEFAULT ;
00039         portg = IO_AS_DEFAULT ;
00040 
00041         // Set pin2 and pin7 of PORTE as output (the other pin are set as input by default)
00042         porte = (IO_AS_OUTPUT << PIN_2) | (IO_AS_OUTPUT << PIN_7 ); 
00043 
00044         // Finally, write the i/o configuration:
00045         SetIOWay(portb, porte,portf,portg);
00046 
00047         // Init timer overflow to 7.5 ms
00048         Timer1Init(50536,TIMER1_8);
00049 
00050         tick2=0;
00051 
00052         // Attach a function to timer1
00053         Timer1AttachFunction(MyTimerFunction);
00054 
00055         tick=0;
00056         while(1)
00057         {
00058                 // Wait an overflow of timer:
00059         if( IsTimer1Overflow() == 1 )
00060         {
00061                         // Clock output on pin 7 of PORTE: 
00062             if(tick==0)
00063             {
00064                                 SetOutput(PORTE,PIN_7);
00065                 tick=1;
00066                         }
00067             else
00068             {
00069                                 ClearOutput(PORTE,PIN_7);
00070                 tick=0;
00071                         }
00072         }
00073 
00074         }
00075 
00076         return 0;
00077 }
